title: Recent KüA Plan Updates
description: Data structure, containing all recent updates in the KüA Plan of one event to be sent by the GET /updates API endpoint

changedEntries.description: List of new and changed entries. Existing entries with same id should be replaced by the new version in this list.

rooms.description: New list of rooms. If this property exists, all rooms shall be replaced by this list.

categories.description: New list of categories. If this property exists, all categories shall be replaced by this list.
